roleset.name: accept or adopt as one's own
roleset.note: INTERNALIZE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from internalize.01-v)

example.name: internalize
example.text: According to Liu, "The people of Meinung have now internalized the movement as a philosophy of life."

example.name: Noun example -- internalization, all args
example.text: How much of it is his internalization of her failure as his failure?

roleset.name: on the inside
roleset.note: INTERNAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from internal.01-j)

role.descr: thing arg1 is on the inside of

example.name: arg1
example.text: He states that his skin has totally healed and that the pain he feels is deep internal .
